attributes.action: Reduce the prices being charged in supermarkets for food!
attributes.additional_details: Simply reduce the price of food.
attributes.background: They prices in all supermarkets are just ridiculous and unjustified now. All the healthier produce especially should be cheaper to help people eat better. The minimum wage has went up but the price of food has inflated more than the minimum wage.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Investigate food costs & introduce regulation & a cap on essential food prices
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747332
